exm.mng: to copy (a model of calligraphy or painting etc)
to trace over, to take a copy (of a calligraphy, a painting etc), (fig.) to describe, to portray
fingerprint, thumbprint, also written 指模[zhi3 mo2]
Wolfgang Amadeus Mozart (1756-1791), Austrian composer, also written 莫扎特
to trace over, to copy (a calligraphy model), facsimile, (fig.) to depict, to portray
variant of 模擬|模拟[mo2 ni3]
